Content:: It Couldn't Happen to a Nicer Guy is a 1974 American made-for-television black comedy film starring Paul Sorvino and JoAnna Cameron. The film was co-written and produced by Arne Sultan[1] as an ABC Movie of the Week installment. Harry Walters, a stout real estate salesman who is randomly picked up by a beautiful woman, Wanda Olivia Wellman, then raped at gunpoint as a prank. He is later dropped off naked in a small town and left to explain to his wife, friends, and the police how he was both kidnapped and raped by a woman.  This article related to an American TV movie is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: It Couldn't Happen to a Nicer Guy - Wikipedia
